analyzed: dhamma paccanīya anuloma tika duka paṭṭhāna pāḷi

original: Nasanidassanasappaṭighaṁ nahetuṁ dhammaṁ paṭicca anidassanaappaṭigho hetu dhammo
analyzed: na sa nidassana sa ppaṭigham na hetum dhammam paṭicca anidassana appaṭighaḥ hetu dhammo

original: uppajjati hetupaccayā. Naanidassanasappaṭighaṁ nahetuṁ dhammaṁ paṭicca anidassanaappaṭigho
analyzed: uppajjati hetu paccayā na anidassana sappaṭigham na hetum dhammam paṭicca anidassana appaṭighaḥ

original: hetu dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā. Nasanidassanasappaṭighaṁ nahetuñca naanidassanasappaṭighaṁ
analyzed: hetu dhammaḥ uppajjati hetu paccayā na sa nidassana sa paṭigham na hetuñca na a nidassana sa paṭigha

original: nahetuñca dhammaṁ paṭicca anidassanaappaṭigho hetu dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā.
analyzed: na hetuñca dhammam paṭicca anidassana appaṭighaḥ hetu dhammo uppajjati hetu paccayā
saṅkhitta hetuyā tīṇi pe avigate tīṇi

original: Nasanidassanasappaṭighaṁ nanahetuṁ dhammaṁ paṭicca sanidassanasappaṭigho nahetu dhammo
analyzed: na sa nidassana sa paṭigham na na hetum dhammam paṭicca sa nidassana sa paṭighaḥ na hetu dhammaḥ

original: uppajjati hetupaccayā. Nasanidassanasappaṭighaṁ nanahetuṁ dhammaṁ paṭicca anidassanasappaṭigho
analyzed: uppajjati hetu paccayā na sa nidassana sa paṭigham na na hetum dhammam paṭicca anidassana sa paṭighaḥ

original: nahetu dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā. (Nahetu nanahetu ovattā, tīṇi mūlāni, ekavīsati
analyzed: na hetu dhammaḥ uppajjati hetu paccayā na hetu na na hetu ovattā tīṇi mūlāni ekavīsati

original: pañhā kātabbā.) Hetuyā ekavīsa, ārammaṇe tīṇi …pe… avigate ekavīsa.
analyzed: pañhā kātabbā hetuyā ekavīsa ārammaṇe tīṇi pe avigate ekavīsa
